title: 105_hr4657
content: The Act titled "Spring Mountain Exchange Act of 1998" allows for the exchange of lands and mineral interests. The Spring Mountain Exchange Act of 1998 allows the Secretary of the Interior to convey approximately 1,463 acres of Federal lands in Nevada to Rhodes Design and Development Corporation in exchange for lands and interests conveyed by the Corporation. The Secretary must determine the lands and interests subject to exchange within 90 days after the final determination. The Secretary must determine the lands subject to exchange within 90 days. The Corporation must convey approximately 490 acres of lands in Nevada to the United States. If the values of exchanged lands are not equal, equalization payments will be made. The Secretary must determine lands for exchange within 90 days. The Corporation must convey 490 acres in Nevada to the United States. Valuation of lands must follow appraisal standards and exclude endangered species presence. The Corporation must make direct payments to Nevada and the Southern Nevada Water Authority. The Corporation must make payments to the State of Nevada and the Southern Nevada Water Authority based on the fair market value of Federal lands conveyed. The State's payment is 5% for education, and the Authority's payment is 10% for water infrastructure in Clark County. The Secretary may make minor corrections to maps with the Corporation's agreement. If the Corporation cancels the land exchange, the lands will revert to their previous status. Lands acquired by the United States will be managed accordingly. Upon acceptance of title by the United States, lands acquired within various designated systems or areas shall become part of the unit without further action and be managed according to applicable laws and management plans. The term "Corporation" refers to the Rhodes Design and Development Corporation. The term "Corporation" refers to the Rhodes Design and Development Corporation established in Nevada, and the term "Secretary" refers to the Secretary of the Interior.
